{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-22T21:09:24.000Z", "description": "Site Reliability Engineer - Unicorn startup w/ Revenue

This Jobot Job is hosted by Adam Bennett

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the \"Apply\" button and sending us your resume.

A Bit About Us

We\u2019re a software company that has built a PaaS product that enables large enterprises to automate business decisions! We have a long list of current clients and have a line out the door of companies who want to integrate our platform into their supply chain, inventory, sales, and operation applications!



Why join us?


We\u2019re at an inflection point. We\u2019re scaling our teams and potentially doubling our company in size! We\u2019re currently over 300 people. We have a culture-first organization and the leader of the DevOps / SRE team wants to see everyone succeed. We\u2019re looking for engineers to help us scale! We\u2019re an AWS/ Azure shop and rely heavily on Kubernetes for scale.

Job Details

Must have Senior experience with deploying and maintaining Kubernetes.

Ideally, you have Sr. level experience with a scripting language to scale infrastructure.

Senior experience supporting cloud applications in AWS or Azure.

Monitoring applications are a really big \u201cnice to have\u201d

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the \"Apply\" button.
